questions.quote: Oh, you're not gonna get caught. Look, let me get him. Man, it's the nineties, it's Hammer time! Come on, just let me get him.
You gotta get an estimate on my car from him. I think this garage is trying to screw me.
June 14, 1987.... Mets Phillies. We're enjoying a beautiful afternoon in the right field stands when a crucial Hernandez error to a five run Phillies ninth. Cost the Mets the game.
Because you said this would be better. Remember? A vacation from ourselves. That's what you said.
Apparently the glue in the wedding invitations was a....toxic.
I just need someone who can give me some kind of direction. I'll see ya.
Poison you? Jerry Seinfeld tried to poison you? Wha? Mr. Pitt, what are you, delirious? He's never even met you!
Anybody want to take a walk down to 48th street? I think I may have tracked down another receipt.
Well, my lawyer says 14 months, but with good behavior, maybe...10?
No, no, no. I have to get home tonight. Bridget's gonna be waiting for me at the Diplomat's Club. Rent a car.
